channel.title: Currently-Reading on Strat
channel.description: Recent content in Currently-Reading on Strat

item.title: ODY-C
item.description:
Gender-swapped psychedelic sci-fi comic book version of Homer’s Odyssey?

Sounds crazy. I’m into it.

item.title: Critical Directions In Comics Studies
item.description: Collection of academic articles in comics studies. Starts with a great comic strip introducing the collection itself followed by comic panels drawn by the authors of the articles themselves. Very cool!

item.title: Doom Patrol
item.description: Grant Morrison’s run of Doom Patrol focuses on the misfits, the weird and the broken and how they are fit to fight evils that other more conventional and sane heroes aren’t equipped to deal with.

item.title: The Word For World Is Forest
item.description:
Seems like Ursula K. Le Guin is subverting the old school military science fiction trope of humans going around killing “aliens” with the humans doing the killing framed as the good guys who we’re supposed to be rooting for. Maybe colonialism is bad?

Let’s see how this goes.
